title: Sengoku Basara Dokugan
original_name: 戦国 BASARA ドクガン
sinopse:
It's the year 0011 in the Basara calendar, and Oushuu has been forced to yield to rule by Ushuu's Mogami Yoshiaki and his tyranny. Against that backdrop, a one-eyed man with a wild motorbike appears...

(Source: Raindrops and Daydreams)
